summary: the Early Childhood Oral Health Impact Scale (ECOHIS) was designed to assess caregivers’ perceptions of OHRQoL in preschool children. it was translated into many languages but has yet to be validated in Arabic. this questionnaire was translated into many languages. the child, family sections and overall questionnaire were 0.80, 0.78, and 0.85 respectively. the intra-class correlation coefficient (ICC) of A-ECOHIS was 0.86.
